content.title: Mapping Form UI to the Services
content.body:
1. From the Data & Services panel on the top right of your canvas, expand Project Services > Identity > MicrosoftActiveDirectory > login > Request.
  2. Drag and drop the userid parameter from the Data & Services panel onto the Username text field on your canvas.
  3. Drag and drop the password parameter from the Data & Services panel onto the Password text field on your canvas.

You have now mapped:

  • userid parameter to the text in tbxUsername text field
  • password parameter to the text in tbxPassword text field
